subject: Accidents and Safety
Football
lead_paragraph: A former N.F.L. quarterback who failed to attend his sentencing on drunken driving charges nearly four years ago was killed in a car crash in Greece, authorities said, leaving behind an unsolved mystery involving two suspicious fires and years spent on the lam.
